activities:
RedCAT Systems, LLC ("RedCAT") operates in the following categories: (1) RedCAT as Controller; and (2) RedCAT as a Data Processor on behalf of its clients.

RedCAT (as Controller) processes personal information of prospective, current and former associates for human resources purposes such as recruitment, workplace administration, compensation, benefits, performance/talent management, compliance, engagement, authentication and other legal and customary business-related purposes, such as making back-up copies of files for business continuity, systems maintenance and other everyday human resources tasks.

RedCAT (as a Data Processor on behalf of its' clients) processes data on behalf of its clients that may be used for a variety of purposes including but not limited to benefits, payroll, human resources data management, compliance, compensation, reporting, and performance/talent management. 

RedCAT does not own or control any of the information it processes on behalf of its' clients (all such information is owned and controlled by RedCATs' clients).
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources (online, offline, organizational), customer, prospect
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for organization human resources data; the American Arbitration Association for all other data.
